text: Hanging Up is a 2000 American German comedy drama movie directed by Diane Keaton (who also stars) and based on the 1995 novel of the same name by Delia Ephron. It stars Lisa Kudrow, Meg Ryan, Walter Matthau, Adam Arkin, Cloris Leachman, Myndy Crist, Charles Matthau and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:2000 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German drama movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about sisters Category:Movies about death
title: Hanging Up
